queries.name: People_Died_of_Sudden_Infant_Death_Syndrome
queries.title: People Who Died of Sudden Infant Death Syndrome
queries.description: Lists people who died of Sudden Infant Death Syndrome. The query retrieves and displays the names of individuals associated with the medical condition, Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (Q3235597).

queries.name: Female_Humans_with_Occupation_Q16271064_and_No_Eng_Wikipedia
queries.title: Female Humans with Occupation Q16271064 and No English Wikipedia Entry
queries.description: Lists female entities with the given occupation (Q16271064) but no English Wikipedia links. It includes their identifiers, and the count of their sitelinks to other languages or projects.

queries.name: Course_Topics_in_Taiwanese_Wikipedia
queries.title: Course Topics in Taiwanese Wikipedia
queries.description: Identifies distinct course topics that are part of a certain curriculum and have articles in Taiwanese Wikipedia. It lists topic identifiers, labels, and corresponding article URLs.

queries.name: Identifiers_for_Quartz_and_Topaz
queries.title: Identifiers for Quartz and Topaz
queries.description: Retrieves identifiers for the minerals Quartz and Topaz. The query filters for these specific stones and returns their respective identifiers.

queries.name: Characters_in_Series_Q682371
queries.title: Characters in Series with Identifier Q682371
queries.description: Lists characters from a series with identifier Q682371. The results display unique identifiers and corresponding labels for each character, utilizing automatic language translation, prioritizing Japanese.

queries.name: Cat_Entities
queries.sparql: #Chats SELECT ?item ?itemLabel WHERE { ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q146. # doit avoir comme nature chat SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # le label viendra de préférence dans votre langue, et autrement en anglais }
queries.title: Entities Characterized as Cats
queries.description: Lists entities that have been characterized as cats. The results include identifiers and labels for each entity, with labels prioritized in the user's language or in English if not available.

queries.name: Birthdate_of_Mother_Teresa
queries.title: Birthdate of Mother Teresa
queries.description: A simple query to retrieve the birthdate of Mother Teresa (wd:Q22686) from the Wikidata. The result includes the specific date of birth.

queries.name: Kerala_Politicians_and_their_Politician_Children
queries.title: Politicians from Kerala and their Children who are also Politicians
queries.description: Lists politicians from Kerala who have children also serving as politicians. The output includes identifiers and names of both the politician and their child, each of whom are verified politicians.

queries.name: Gender_Count_of_English_Writers
queries.title: Gender Count of English Writers
queries.description: Counts the number of English writers based on gender. It identifies each individual's gender and counts the number of individuals identified as that gender. Only includes those who have English Wikipedia pages.

queries.name: Graph_View_of_Selected_Items_and_Their_Relationships
queries.title: Graph View of Selected Items and Their Relationships
queries.description: Displays a graph view of selected items and their relationships. It shows the nodes (items) and edges (relations) between them, optionally with images. The items are pre-selected and identified with Wikidata IDs. The results include labels and optional images for each item and relationship.

queries.name: British_Historic_Sites_and_Monuments
queries.sparql:
SELECT ?item ?article ?itemLabel ?GfS ?dsa ?grace ?canmore ?hs  ?commonscat WHERE {
    ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q108792154 .
    ?item wdt:P17 wd:Q145 .
    OPTIONAL {?article schema:about ?item ; schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/> } .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P373 ?commonscat} .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P7350 ?GfS} .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P7630 ?dsa} .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P3074 ?grace} .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P718 ?canmore} .
    OPTIONAL {?item wdt:P709 ?hs} .
    SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
queries.title: British Historic Sites and Monuments Information
queries.description: Provides data about UK's historic sites and monuments recognized as Scheduled Monuments. It includes their identifiers, labels, and links to related resources such as Wikipedia articles and database entries in GfS, DSA, Grace, Canmore, HS, and Commons category.

queries.name: Count_of_City_Types_in_Country
queries.title: Count of Different City Types in a Specific Country
queries.description: Retrieves and counts the different types of cities in a specific country. The results include the city's name and the count of its type. Only cities appearing more than once are displayed, ordered by their count in descending order.

queries.name: Catalog_of_Cats_With_Websites
queries.title: Catalog of Cats With Their Websites
queries.description: Lists all entities that are cats, along with their labels and optional website links. The results are fetched from Wikibase and displayed in the user's preferred language.

queries.name: Species_level_taxon_names
queries.title: Species-level Taxon Names from Wikidata
queries.description: Queries for species-level taxon names from Wikidata, excluding those with a main subject of the target or a taxon rank of 'species'. Returns the work identifier, main subject, taxon, heuristic, and deduced information for the queried items.

queries.name: Coastal_Habitat_Articles
queries.title: Coastal Habitat Articles Excluding a Specific ID
queries.description: Searches for articles on 'coastal habitat' that are instances of scholarly articles and excludes those associated with a specific ID. It includes the article title and the venue where it was published.

queries.name: Musical_Instruments_Categorized_As_Cats
queries.sparql:
#Musical instruments query
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?accused
WHERE 
{
  ?item wdt:P10838 ?accused . # Must be of a cat
  ?item wdt:P1552 wd:Q34379 .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
queries.title: Musical Instruments Categorized as Cats
queries.description: Lists musical instruments that are categorized as cats. It includes the identifiers and labels of the instruments, and the entity accused of being a cat. The query primarily uses P10838 and P1552 properties.

queries.name: Creation_date_of_Versailles_Palace
queries.title: Creation Date of Versailles Palace
queries.description: Retrieves the date the Palace of Versailles was created. The query returns a single value representing the inception date of the Palace of Versailles.

queries.name: Current_Ministry_of_Home_Affairs
queries.title: Current Ministry of Home Affairs
queries.description: Retrieves the current Ministry of Home Affairs. The results include the unique identifier and the English label of the entity.

queries.name: Kin_Selection_Wikidata_Search
queries.title: Wikidata Search for 'Kin Selection'
queries.description: Searches Wikidata for entries titled 'kin selection'. It excludes entries that already have the property P921 associated with the ID Q741598. The results include unique identifiers, properties, and deduced values.

queries.name: Spanish_Names_for_Countries
queries.title: Spanish Names for Countries
queries.description: This query retrieves the Spanish labels for all entities in Wikidata that are classified as 'countries'. The results consist of the Wikidata identifier and the Spanish name for each country.

queries.name: MainSubjects_in_CurriculumTopic_with_Wikipedia_Links
queries.title: Main Subjects in a Curriculum Topic with Wikipedia Links
queries.description: Lists the main subjects in a specific curriculum topic that have corresponding Wikipedia articles. The query returns the subjects' identifiers, names, and links to their English, Dagbani, and Twi Wikipedia pages.

queries.name: Washington_DC_Reverse_Traversal
queries.title: Reverse Traversal For Washington DC
queries.description: Executes a reverse traversal starting from Washington DC, showing entities linked by location property. It shows each entity's name, identifiers and optionally connected entities. The traversal depth is limited to 1 iteration.

queries.name: Proteins_and_Genes_with_Specific_Subunits
queries.title: Proteins and Genes Associated with Specific Subunits
queries.description: Lists proteins and their corresponding genes associated with specific subunits. The query includes genes linked to the protein and the chromosome where the gene is located. It provides the identifiers and labels for proteins, genes, and chromosomes.

queries.name: Princeton_WordNet_3.1_Wikidata
queries.title: Princeton WordNet 3.1 on Wikidata
queries.description: Fetches distinct items from Wikidata associated with Princeton WordNet 3.1. The output includes the item's label, Princeton ID, and an example linked sense. Results are limited to 100.

queries.name: Participant_Details_with_Country_and_Coordinates
queries.title: Participant Details with Country and Coordinates
queries.description: Retrieves details of a participant who is an instance of the entity identified by Q111535559. The data includes the participant's label, the country associated with the participant, the country's label, and the country's coordinates.

queries.name: Slice_Service_Unlinked_Human_Entities
queries.title: Unlinked Human Entities in Slice Service
queries.description: Lists human entities that do not have a link to any property P10832. It uses the Slice Service to offset the start item number and limit the list to 500000 items. The results include entities without link to property P10832.

queries.name: GB1900_Coordinates_Comparison
queries.title: Comparison of GB1900 and Wikidata Coordinates
queries.description: Compares coordinates from GB1900 and Wikidata for various entities excluding human settlements. Entities are selected based on their GB1900 and coordinates statements. The results include the difference in latitudes and longitudes, entity identifiers, labels, and map URLs.

queries.name: Missing_Outdoor_Gym_Data_from_Sumpan
queries.title: Missing Outdoor Gym Data from Sumpan
queries.description: Locates items classified as 'Outdoor Gym' (wd:Q692630) within the administrative territory of Sumpan (wd:Q972564). Provides item labels, administrative labels, coordinates, images, and optional website links. Query results are sorted by item labels. Data is presented in Swedish, German, and English.

queries.name: Quickstatements_to_Correct_Year_Value
queries.title: Quickstatements to Correct the Year Value
queries.description: A query to identify and correct values associated with property P1031 that contain 'Mot. 1999/09', replacing it with '1999/00'. The output includes the original and corrected values for each item.

queries.name: Euskal_Lexemak_with_Lindemann_Alonso
queries.title: Euskal Lexemak in Wikidata Linked to Lindemann/Alonso
queries.description: Provides a list of Euskal Lexemak (Basque Lexemes) in Wikidata that are linked to the Lindemann/Alonso dictionary. The results include lexeme ID, lemma and related Wikisource URLs.

queries.name: Objects_Related_to_Shah_Jahan
queries.title: Objects Related in Some Way to Shah Jahan
queries.description: Displays objects related to Shah Jahan, the Mughal emperor. The query maps the relations of these objects to Shah Jahan, and if they are part of any collection. The results include object's identifiers, images, and their relation to Shah Jahan.

queries.name: Japanese_Libraries_Details
queries.title: Details of Libraries in Japan
queries.description: Retrieves details of libraries in Japan including their labels, ISIL identifiers, NDL Authority IDs and postal codes. The query automatically adjusts to the language setting.

queries.name: Index_of_Collections_Books
queries.title: Index of Books in Collections
queries.description: Lists written works in a specific collection. It presents the title, publication date, collection label, place of publication, and online catalog link of each work. The results are ordered by publication date.

queries.name: Artwork_Properties_Count_in_Collection
queries.title: Count of Distinct Artwork Properties in a Collection
queries.description: Displays different properties of artworks in a specific collection. It excludes those marked as a 'collection of the museum'. The results are grouped by property and include the count of artworks with each property.

queries.name: Female_Greek_Artists_Details
queries.title: Detailed Information about Female Greek Artists
queries.description: Provides detailed information about female Greek artists. The details include their names, birthdates, deathdates, and descriptions. The query also returns labels in English, French, and Italian.

queries.name: Protected_Areas_in_Freiburg_Switzerland
queries.title: Protected Natural or Landscape Areas in Freiburg, Switzerland
queries.description: Lists protected areas in nature or landscape that are part of the Federal Inventory of Dry Meadows/Grasslands in Freiburg, Switzerland. It includes their official names, founding dates, coordinates, images, and associated Wikimedia Commons categories.

queries.name: Indonesian_Museums_in_Special_Region_of_Yogyakarta
queries.title: Indonesian Museums in Special Region of Yogyakarta
queries.description: Displays a list of museums in the Special Region of Yogyakarta, Indonesia. It shows the museum's name, establishment date, and coordinates. The query is limited to 50 results, and it's ordered by the province label.

queries.name: German_Organizational_Units_In_Astronomy
queries.title: German Organizational Units in the Field of Astronomy
queries.description: Lists German organizational units related to Astronomy, including their geographical coordinates, labels, email addresses, official websites, and institution type. It also shows the larger institution they are part of.

queries.name: Relatives_of_Beethoven_and_their_Instruments
queries.title: Relatives of Beethoven and their Musical Instruments
queries.description: Lists Beethoven's relatives and the musical instruments they play. The query traverses through Beethoven's family tree and identifies relatives who play an instrument.

queries.name: Novels_and_Characters_from_Publisher
queries.title: Novels and Characters Published in a Specific Edition
queries.description: Retrieves a list of novels and their respective characters published in a specific edition by a particular publisher. It displays the novel and character identifiers and labels in Serbian or English.

queries.name: Repository_Information_for_Item_Q106703494
queries.title: Repository Information for Item Q106703494
queries.description: Retrieves and maps information related to the repository associated with the Wikidata item Q106703494. Information includes the repository's label, website, coordinates, and associated country.

queries.name: Graph_View_of_Entity_Q10225_Related_Properties
queries.title: Graph View of Entity Q10225 and Related Properties
queries.description: Displays a graph view of the entity Q10225 and its related properties. The query also includes child nodes and images if available. Results are filtered to display only entities and properties in Wikidata.

queries.name: Most_linked_Films_without_ZZ_Wikipedia_Page
queries.title: Most Linked Films without a ZZ Wikipedia Page
queries.description: Lists films (instances of Q133585) with the most site links, excluding those with a ZZ Wikipedia page. The results include the film's identifiers, labels in multiple languages, and an optional image.

queries.name: Instances_Authors_Texts_Related_to_Covid19
queries.title: Instances, Authors, and Texts Related to Covid-19
queries.description: Fetches instances linked to Covid-19, along with their associated authors and available full texts. The results include the identifiers of the instances, the names of the authors, and the URLs of the full texts.

queries.name: Items_with_Statements_in_Range_and_Instance_of_Music_Single
queries.title: Items with Statements Count in Specific Range and Instance of Music Single
queries.description: Extracts items having a statements count in the range of 100 to 1000 and are instances of 'Music Single'. It includes the items' identifiers, labels, and the corresponding statement count, sorted in descending order of the statement count.

queries.name: People_Died_in_Municipality_of_Maribor
queries.title: People who Died in Municipality of Maribor
queries.description: Lists individuals who died in the Municipality of Maribor. Includes individuals who have the place of death recorded in Wikidata. Note that not all Slovenians have this data entry.

queries.name: Nuclear_Particles_with_Nucleon_Sum_238
queries.title: Nuclear Particles with a Total Nucleon Sum of 238
queries.description: Lists nuclear particles with a total nucleon sum of 238. It displays the nuclear particle label, subclass, number of protons, and neutrons. The results are ordered by the number.

queries.name: 17th_Century_German_Composers_Who_Died_in_London
queries.sparql:
# List of 17th-century German composers who died in London
SELECT ?composer ?composerLabel ?birthdate ?birthplaceLabel ?deathplace ?deathplaceLabel
WHERE {
  ?composer wdt:P106 wd:Q36834;    # Composer occupation
#           wdt:P27 wd:Q183;       # Nationality: Germany
            wdt:P569 ?birthdate;   # Date of birth
            wdt:P19 ?birthplace.   # Place of birth

  ?composer wdt:P20 ?deathplace;   # Place of death
            wdt:P570 ?deathdate.   # Date of death
  
  ?birthplace  wdt:P17 wd:Q183.    # Located in Germany

  FILTER(YEAR(?birthdate) >= 1600 && YEAR(?birthdate) <= 1699)
  FILTER(?deathplace = wd:Q84)  # Q84 is the Wikidata identifier for London
  
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
queries.title: 17th Century German Composers Who Died in London
queries.description: Provides a list of German composers born in the 17th century who died in London. The results include composers' names, birth dates, birthplaces, and deathplaces. All birthplaces are located in Germany.

queries.name: Distinct_Items_In_Film_And_Software
queries.title: Distinct Items in Film and Software
queries.description: Extracts distinct items that are either in the category of film or software. The results exclude items belonging to the categories of part of, is a work in the series, has edition or translation, and is part of the series. The results are limited to 5000 items.

queries.name: Birthplaces_of_Malaysian_Women
queries.title: Birthplaces of Malaysian Women
queries.description: Maps the birthplaces of Malaysian women. Displays their names, birthplaces, birth year, optional images and occupations. The map points are linked to the respective Wikipedia articles for more information.

queries.name: Count_of_LexicalEntry_With_Specific_FilePath
queries.title: Count of Lexical Entries With Specific File Path
queries.description: Counts the number of Lexical Entries with a file that matches a specific file path on Wikimedia Commons. The file path is filtered to match files starting with 'LL-' in their name.

queries.name: Bibliography_of_Saxony_Region
queries.title: Regional Bibliography of Saxony
queries.description: Lists items associated with the regional bibliography of Saxony. The results include the items' identifiers and labels, using automatic language detection for labels when possible.

queries.name: Disease_Data_from_Wikipedia_and_Wikidata
queries.title: Disease Data Pulled from Wikipedia and Wikidata
queries.description: Fetches data on diseases from Wikidata and corresponding English Wikipedia articles. It provides disease's Wikidata identifier, labels, alternative labels, description, linked article, and ICD-10 code if available.

queries.name: Items_with_P757_and_P1435_but_not_P2614
queries.title: Items that have properties P757 and P1435, but not P2614
queries.description: Queries for items that have the properties P757 and P1435 with a qualifier P2614, but does not have the property P2614. Displays up to 5000 distinct items.

queries.name: Items_Manufactured_by_Certain_Company
queries.title: Items Manufactured by a Specific Company
queries.description: Lists items that are of the type 'pharmaceutical product' and are manufactured by a specific company. The results include the item's identifier and label in the user's preferred language or English.

queries.name: Population_ISO_Region_Country_Details
queries.title: Population, ISO, Region, and Country Details
queries.description: Fetches information about regions' population, ISO codes, associated countries and their labels. It also includes the regions' labels in English. The results are limited to 100 entries.

queries.name: Architectural_Items_Linked_to_Q100363299
queries.title: Architectural Items Linked to Wikidata Entity Q100363299
queries.description: Lists architectural items linked to the Wikidata entity Q100363299. It displays items, their labels, associated architects, and architects' labels. The results may include optional architectural data.

queries.name: Items_Located_in_Museums_in_France
queries.title: Items Located in Museums in France
queries.description: Lists items that are located in museums in France. It shows the item's name and the corresponding museum's label. The items are linked to their country (France) and their location (museum).

queries.name: Berlin_Properties
queries.title: Properties Associated with Berlin
queries.description: Lists properties associated with Berlin excluding external IDs. It includes the property and object identifiers and labels in the preferred language, defaulting to English.

queries.name: American_Architectural_Buildings_with_Images
queries.title: American Architectural Buildings with Images
queries.description: Displays images of architectural buildings in the United States. It shows the building's details, including its country, local and administrative jurisdiction, and worldview. The results include each building's identifier, image, and related labels.

queries.name: Swedish_Actors_Chronologically
queries.title: Swedish Actors Ordered by Birth Year
queries.description: This query returns Swedish actors with their images, birth year, and death year, if applicable. It also links to their respective Swedish Wikipedia articles. Actors are ordered chronologically by birth year.

queries.name: Total_Population_in_Oresund_Region
queries.sparql:
#Total population in the Øresund Region
# by So9q, 2019-11-22
 # Total population in the Øresund Region
 # Example of the SUM aggregate function
 
 SELECT distinct ?area ?areaLabel (sum(?folkm_ngd) as ?total_folkm) # the first two variables can be removed
                                                                    # if only the number is needed
 WHERE {
   ?item wdt:P361 wd:Q297853.
   ?item wdt:P1082 ?folkm_ngd. 
  ?area wdt:P31 wd:Q1907114.
  ?area wdt:P527 ?item.
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
group by ?area ?areaLabel
queries.title: Total Population in the Øresund Region
queries.description: It displays the total population in the Øresund Region. The results include area, area label, and total population. The results are grouped by area and area label.

queries.name: ViafURIs_for_Humans
queries.title: VIAF URIs for Humans
queries.description: Returns the VIAF (Virtual International Authority File) URIs for human entities. It combines the VIAF ID with the base URI to create the complete URI. The query is limited to 10 results.

queries.name: Polish_Monuments_Map
queries.title: Map of Monuments in Poland
queries.description: Displays a map of distinct monuments located in Poland. Each monument is identified by its unique item code and coordinates, using the Wikibase language service for labeling.

queries.name: Churches_in_Sønderborg_with_Images
queries.title: Churches in Sønderborg Municipality with Images
queries.description: Lists churches in the Sønderborg Municipality with associated images. It provides church entities, their labels, and any linked images. The query's language is set to auto-detect or English.

queries.name: Wikidata_Entity_Members_and_Dates
queries.title: Members and Dates of a Wikidata Entity
queries.description: Retrieves dates and members related to a specific Wikidata entity. The results include the specific dates and number of members associated with the Wikidata entity.

queries.name: Human_settlements_in_Minsk_region
queries.title: Human Settlements in Minsk Region
queries.description: Lists distinct human settlements in the Minsk region, excluding certain types of entities. The results include the entities' identifiers, labels, and descriptions in the 'be-tarask,be' languages.

queries.name: Commons_Category_Link_for_Entity
queries.title: Wikimedia Commons Category Link for a Specific Entity
queries.description: Retrieves the Wikimedia Commons category link for a specific entity (wd:Q144). The query checks both the direct linkage from the entity and via the associated category item.

queries.name: Villages_and_Images
queries.title: Villages with Images
queries.description: Retrieves villages and their corresponding images. Each result includes the identifier of the village, its English label, and a link to its image if one exists.

queries.name: Items_with_Property_P8274_linked_to_Q4459799
queries.title: Items with Property P8274 Linked to Q4459799
queries.description: Fetches items that have the property P8274 linked to the entity Q4459799. It includes the item's identifiers and labels in English. The query has a limit of 100 results.

queries.name: Czech_Railway_Network
queries.title: Czech Railway Network
queries.description: Maps railway stations and lines in the Czech Republic. It displays entities in the Czech Republic, showing their names, coordinates, and linked railway lines. The results include entities' identifiers, coordinates, and related line details.

queries.name: Humans_with_Children_Who_Are_Humans
queries.title: Humans with Children Who Are Also Humans
queries.description: Lists humans who have children who are also humans. The query returns both the identifier of the human and their label. Only the first 100 results are returned by the query.

queries.name: Items_with_Telegram_Username
queries.sparql: SELECT ?item ?tlg WHERE { ?item wdt:P3576 ?tlg . }
queries.title: Items with Telegram Username
queries.description: Fetches items that have a Telegram username associated with them. The query returns items' identifiers and their corresponding Telegram usernames.

queries.name: Members_of_International_Council_for_Science
queries.title: Members of the International Council for Science
queries.description: Lists members of the International Council for Science, sorted by country and name. The result includes member entity's identifiers, descriptions, associated country, and their official website URLs.

queries.name: Items_DevelopedBy_SoftwareCompany
queries.title: Items Developed By Specified Software Company
queries.description: Lists items developed by a specific software company. The results include items' identifiers and their respective names in the preferred language or English.

queries.name: 2ELn
queries.sparql: "dentist"

queries.name: Items_with_equivalent_property
queries.title: Items with an Equivalent Property
queries.description: Fetches items that have an equivalent property. The results include the identifiers of the items, their labels, and the equivalent properties.

queries.name: Musicians_Birthdates_and_Images
queries.title: Birthdates and Images of Musicians
queries.description: This query retrieves data about musicians including their names, birthdates and images. It uses the Wikidata service to fetch this information and returns up to 100 results.

queries.name: Query_for_Cats
queries.title: Query for Cats in Wikidata
queries.description: This query retrieves all items in Wikidata that are classified as cats. It returns the identifiers and labels of these items in English or the auto-detected language.

queries.name: Mandals_of_AP_District_Post_2022_Reorganization
queries.title: Mandals of Andhra Pradesh District Post 2022 Reorganization
queries.description: Fetches the mandals (administrative divisions) of a district in Andhra Pradesh, India, as per the 2022 reorganization. It provides mandals' names, labels and Wikipedia page titles in Telugu. The mandals are ordered by their labels.

queries.name: African_Born_Actors_Directors_and_Models
queries.title: Actors, Directors, and Models Born in Africa
queries.description: Lists actors, models, and directors who were born in Africa. It includes their identifiers and labels. The results are capped at 5000 entries.

queries.name: Interconnected_Items_with_Images
queries.title: Interconnected Items with Their Images
queries.description: This query retrieves specific interconnected items along with their images. It displays the items, their connected items, and the images of both if available. The results include items' identifiers, labels, and associated images.

queries.name: Items_and_Their_Level_of_Description
queries.sparql:
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?levelOfDescription ?levelOfDescriptionLabel
WHERE 
{
  ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q2668072.
  OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P6224 ?levelOfDescription }.
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
queries.title: Items and Their Corresponding Level of Description
queries.description: Lists items that are classified as 'archival descriptions' and their corresponding levels of description, if available. The result includes the item's identifier, label, and the level of description's identifier and label.

queries.name: Items_with_Zero_Statements_and_Sitelinks
queries.title: Wikibase Items with Zero Statements and Sitelinks
queries.description: Retrieves all Wikibase items that have no statements and sitelinks. This query can be used to identify items in the Wikibase that may lack context or relevance due to the absence of statements and sitelinks.

queries.name: Belgian_Beers
queries.title: Belgian Beers with Images
queries.description: Lists Belgian beers and their images. The query retrieves all items that are classified as beer (Q44) and are associated with Belgium (Q31). If available, an image of the beer is also included.

queries.name: Cats_Type_and_Part_Information
queries.title: Cats Type and Associated Part Information
queries.description: Lists items categorized as a specific type of cat (Q113445303) and, if available, a corresponding 'part of' (P8263) designation. Each item includes its label in the user's language and in English.

queries.name: Snooker_Winners_Color_Coded
queries.title: Color Coded Snooker Winners
queries.description: Represents snooker winners and their total wins each color-coded according to the snooker ball colors. Each color corresponds to the number of wins. The data includes the winner's name and their total wins.

queries.name: Swedish_Glaciers_Map
queries.title: Map of Glaciers in Sweden with Various Identifiers
queries.description: Maps glaciers in Sweden with their various identifiers. It displays the coordinates of each glacier along with their Gridabase, GLAMOS, GLIMS, Swedish Glaciers, and World Glacier Inventory IDs. The results are ordered by the glacier name.

queries.name: Places_Less_Than_10_Meters_Above_Sea_Level
queries.sparql:
#Plätze weniger als 10 Meter über dem Meeresspiegel
#defaultView:Map
SELECT
queries.title: Places Less Than 10 Meters Above Sea Level
queries.description: Maps out places that are less than 10 meters above sea level. The query visualizes these locations on a map, allowing for geographical analysis of low-lying areas.

queries.name: Properties_Count_of_French_Championship_Winners
queries.title: Count of Properties of French Championship Winners
queries.description: This query returns the count of distinct properties for each French Championship winner. It includes the properties' labels and their respective count. The results are grouped by property and ordered by count in descending order.

queries.name: Active_Territorial_Administrative_Entities_in_Portugal
queries.title: Active Territorial Administrative Entities in Portugal
queries.description: Fetches active territorial administrative entities (Freguesia) in Portugal. It excludes entities with a specified end time, suggesting that they're no longer active. The results include the entities' identifiers and their labels in the appropriate language.

queries.name: Awards_and_their_Countries
queries.title: Awards and their Respective Countries
queries.description: Lists awards and their respective countries. The results include awards that are 'award by country' or 'national award', their country labels, count of statements and external IDs, and alternative awards labels.

queries.name: French_Entities_without_Coordinates
queries.title: French Entities without Coordinates
queries.description: Lists entities in France that do not have coordinates. The query returns entities that are classified as 'human', based in France, but lack geographic coordinates.

queries.name: Mount_Cameroon_Articles_Excluding_TargetID
queries.title: Articles on Mount Cameroon Excluding a Specific Target ID
queries.description: Searches for articles about Mount Cameroon that do not have a certain Target ID. The query uses different parameters to filter out articles with specific statements. The results are the unique identifiers of the filtered articles.

queries.name: Spanish_Articles_on_Insect_Species
queries.title: Spanish Articles on Specific Insect Species
queries.description: Queries for insect species articles in Spanish Wikipedia. It returns entity identifiers and taxonomic names of insect species that belong to the family Formicidae. Additionally, it provides links to their respective Spanish Wikipedia pages, if available.

queries.name: Infrastructure_Energy_Materials_Mining
queries.sparql:
# 09. INFRASTRUCTURE, ENERGY & MATERIALS 09.1 Mining
SELECT DISTINCT ?manufacturer ?manufacturerLabel ?productType ?productTypeLabel  ?product ?productLabel ?industry ?industryLabel
WHERE {
  ?product wdt:P176 ?manufacturer.
  ?manufacturer wdt:P452 ?industry.
  ?product wdt:P279 ?productType.
   
  VALUES ?industry {wd:Q1778629
wd:Q766401
wd:Q15850907
wd:Q5283
wd:Q56604589
wd:Q12089268
wd:Q1349660
wd:Q1961917
wd:Q1071389
wd:Q11202319
wd:Q29585219
wd:Q29584505
wd:Q44497
wd:Q1945600
wd:Q29584418
wd:Q2990216
wd:Q1370637
wd:Q6865576
wd:Q29584984
wd:Q12880211
wd:Q29584408
wd:Q29584414
wd:Q29584410
wd:Q16638398
wd:Q29584416
wd:Q29584980
wd:Q29584253
wd:Q29584989
wd:Q29584981
wd:Q29584417
wd:Q57443580
wd:Q1048939
wd:Q16659581
wd:Q328381
wd:Q29585539
wd:Q897
wd:Q92768401
wd:Q663
}
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en,fr". } 

}
ORDER BY ?manufacturerLabel ?industryLabel ?productTypeLabel ?productLabel 
LIMIT 25000
queries.title: Infrastructure, Energy & Materials: Mining Industry
queries.description: Lists manufacturers and their products in the mining industry. It provides information about the manufacturer, product type, product, and the industry they belong to. The data is sorted by manufacturer name, industry, product type, and product label. Limited to 25000 entries.

queries.name: NFDI_Affiliations_and_Locations
queries.title: NFDI Affiliations and their Locations in Cities and States
queries.description: Lists the NFDI affiliations and their corresponding locations in cities and states. It includes the affiliations that are either a member of NFDI or have a special type of affiliation. The affiliations that are 'Konsortia associations to Base4NFDI' are excluded.

queries.name: Bavarian_Castles_with_Images
queries.title: Bavarian Castles with Images
queries.description: Lists castles located in Bavaria with their labels and optional images. The query fetches all items that are instances of castles and located in Bavaria, and provides their labels in Bengali and English along with images if available.

queries.name: Bulgarian_Cities_Count
queries.title: Count of Cities in Bulgaria
queries.description: Queries and counts cities in Bulgaria that are either human settlements or subdivisions of urban areas. The results are grouped by city and include cities with more than one record, ordered by the number of records per city.

queries.name: English_Descriptions_of_Cats
queries.title: English Descriptions of Cats
queries.description: Lists all items identified as a 'Cat' (wd:Q146) and compiles their English descriptions. This query groups results by item and label, and concatenates distinct descriptions per item into a single string.
